The car will lose some energy with each collision.

The car will likely follow a path of least resistance.
The car may be deflected after collisions, changing its trajectory.

Second collision: After hitting the small blue cube, the car will likely continue with slightly reduced speed and may collide with the small orange cube nearby.
Subsequent path: The car will probably continue moving left/forward with decreasing energy and may encounter one of the green blocks (medium-sized) which would require more energy to move.
